name: Shin Megami Tensei: Devil Summoner 2 - Raidou Kuzunoha vs. King Abaddon
name_original: Shin Megami Tensei: Devil Summoner 2 - Raidou Kuzunoha vs. King Abaddon
description: Devil Summoner 2: Raidou Kuzunoha vs. King Abaddon chronicles the return of tube-toting Raidou the 14th as he cracks another demon-infested case in this latest Devil Summoner title.
